name: yhttpd
body:
### Welcome to Yet Another HTTP Daemon (yhttpd)

This project was originally commissioned at [AGH University of Science and Technology](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AGH_University_of_Science_and_Technology) in 1998.

### Requirements
1. HTTP Daemon for Linux or any other UNIX flavour
1. HTTP protocol support at version 1.0
1. Implementation using C++ programming language using function from POSIX standard
1. Usage of multiple threads or processes
1. Usage of interprocess communication

### Documentation

Extensive original documentation exist in here (in Polish)

### Authors and Contributors
An original author of this project is Micha≈Ç Jacykiewicz.
